education.name: Government College of Engineering and Research, Avasari
A D Joshi Junior College, Paranda

projects.title: Reliability Performance Tool – GMRT Sub-Systems
projects.description: Built a React-based tool to compute MTBF, MTTF, MTTR, and Failure Rate for GMRT subsystems using historical data. Integrated keyword-based filtering, visual charts, and case study on GAB subsystem.

projects.title: EcoFusion – E-Waste Recycling and E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Developed UI for product listing, admin dashboard, and pickup management to connect users with local e-waste centers.

projects.title: Swiggy Frontend Clone – Food Ordering UI
projects.description: Created a functional clone with restaurant/menu listing, dynamic cart logic, lazy loading, reusable components, and scalable state management.

projects.title: fixmecode – AI JavaScript Auto-Fixer CLI
projects.description: Built a CLI tool that captures JS errors, sends them to Gemini for fixes, and replaces the original file. Published on NPM.

experience.description: Built React-based interfaces for reliability analysis using historical call sheet data. Designed components to compute MTBF, MTTF, Uptime, Downtime, etc. Integrated filters, graphs, and parameter toggles for system diagnostics. Collaborated with research staff to align outputs with real-world system behavior.
